import React from 'react'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import '../home/Home.css'; import Sidebar from '../sidebar/sidebar'; import Header from '../sidebar/header'; import { string, any, number } from 'prop-types'; class Customer extends React.Component { private id: any constructor(props:any) { super(props); this.state = { data: [], setShow: false, isClose: true, NAME_OBJ: string, ID_OBJ: any, ID_OGR: number, NO_OBJ: any, CustomerCode: any }; this.dataListCustomer= this.dataListCustomer.bind(this) this.handleDeleteData= this.handleDeleteData.bind(this) } componentDidMount() { fetch('http://www.o-nolimit.com/Admin/Api/Customer/LoadCustomersApi') .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => this.setState({ data })) .catch(e => { console.log(e); return e; }); // this.handleSubmit; } handleDeleteData(NO_OBJ: any) { return fetch("http://www.o-nolimit.com/Admin/Api/Customer/DeleteCustomerApi?NO_OBJ="+ NO_OBJ, { method: 'delete' }).then(response => response.json().then(json => { return json; }) ); } dataListCustomer() { return( this.state.data.map((item: any, i: any)=>( {item.STT} {item.CustomerCode} {item.CustomerName} {item.Email} {item.Phone} {item.Address} ) ) ) } render(){ const styleshow = { display: this.state.setShow ? "block" : "none" } console.log(this.state.data) return (
